mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.staff_prop_name AS "staffPropName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM staff_prop a
WHERE a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.staff_prop_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffPropName},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff_prop( id, staff_prop_name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{staffPropName}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
